abstract:
Python has some great graphics packages! in this talk, I'll introduce
the fundamentals of 3D graphics and demonstrate how to load 3D models,
created in Blender3D, into an OpenGL window using Pyglet and the Ratcave
extension.

*Tags:* Visualisation

Scheduled on `friday 14:00 </schedule/#fri-14:00-lounge>`__ in room
lounge

title: 3D Graphics in Python with Ratcave and Pyglet
